localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Deepfake videos online are growing exponentially. How to verify if you are watching a fake video? AI-generated social profiles are now ubiquitous. How to make sure that your last LinkedIn connection is not a fake person? Analyze them with Sensity.
blogPost.body: Deepfake videos online are growing exponentially. How to verify if you are watching a fake video? AI-generated social profiles are now ubiquitous. How to make sure that your last LinkedIn connection is not a fake person? Analyze them with Sensity.
blogPost.title: Sensity - The deepfake detection platform
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 网上的深层假视频正在成倍增长。如何验证你看的是否是假视频？AI生成的社交资料现在已经无处不在。如何确定你最后的LinkedIn连接不是一个假人？用Sensity来分析它们。
網上的深層假視頻正在成倍增長。如何驗證你看的是否是假視頻？AI生成的社交資料現在已經無處不在。如何確定你最後的LinkedIn連接不是一個假人？用Sensity來分析它們。

previous.excerpt: Halbestunde introduces a new way of learning the piano. The AI app is a co-trainer, ready to give you customized feedback at any time. Therefore, we use a specifically developed algorithm that allows the app to recognize and play every piece of music you want.
previous.title: Halbestunde - Scan your piece of music and start practicing right away

localize.description: Halbestunde引入了一种新的学琴方式。这款人工智能应用是一个辅助教练，随时可以给你定制化的反馈。因此，我们使用了专门开发的算法，让应用能够识别并弹奏你想要的每一首音乐。
localize.tagline: 扫描您的音乐作品，并立即开始练习。

localize.description: Halbestunde引入了一種新的學琴方式。這款人工智能應用是一個輔助教練，隨時可以給你定製化的反饋。因此，我們使用了專門開發的算法，讓應用能夠識別並彈奏你想要的每一首音樂。
localize.tagline: 掃描您的音樂作品，並立即開始練習。

next.excerpt: ⏱ 1Feed is built to keep you up to date, without being an addictive time sink. 🔎 Add anything to your 1Feed and stay updated across desktop and mobile. 🧘‍♂️ It’s your quiet place on the internet — where you can focus on the people and content you care about!
next.title: 1Feed - Stay up to date 10x faster, with 10x less dopamine 🧘‍♂️

localize.description: ⏱ 1Feed 的设计是为了让您了解最新的信息，而不是让您沉迷于时间。🔎 将任何内容添加到 1Feed 中，并在桌面和移动端保持更新。🧘♂️ 这是你在互联网上的安静之地--在这里你可以专注于你关心的人和内容!
localize.tagline: 🧘♂️以更少的多巴胺，以10倍的速度保持最新状态。

localize.description: ⏱ 1Feed 的設計是爲了讓您瞭解最新的信息，而不是讓您沉迷於時間。🔎 將任何內容添加到 1Feed 中，並在桌面和移動端保持更新。🧘♂️ 這是你在互聯網上的安靜之地--在這裏你可以專注於你關心的人和內容!
